CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 31, 1953, pg. 10 reads: "Complete Red Cross Course - Pictured is the first fall class of the Red Cross home nursing course which meets at Hill City with Mrs. Eunice Wright Cook as instructor. These students automatically become members of the U.S. Civil Defense Administration.  Left to right are Mmes. Mary Ethel Tyler, seated; Willa M. Stills, Lillian Glenn, Katherine Carmichael, Elizabeth Reeves, Arlyne L. Fuqua, Lucille F. Miller, Miss Alice Thomas, Mrs. Cook, the instructor; Mmes. Ida Dabney, Ethel Gross, Helen L. Long and Virginia Edwards. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Nurses, including Mary Ethel Tyler lying in bed, and standing from left: Willa M. Stills, Lillian Glenn, Katherine Carmichael, Elizabeth Reeves, Arlyne L. Fuqua, Lucille F. Miller, Alice Thomas, Eunice Cook in cap, Ida Dabney, Ethel Gross, Helen L. Long, and Virginia Edwards, gathered in Hill City for Red Cross home nursing course
